participants.name: Andrea Paige
participants.description: Group Sales Manager at The Westin Columbus

messages.message:
Wendy
Hey guys, Jim sent me another email and asked me to spread the word, so please send to other family too!
Wendy
From Jim Cullinan:
 Need to get the word out that the reunion dates have changed to July 3rd and 4th, Saturday and Sunday. The realtives from Ireland are supposedly coming too! Please help me spread the word if you can. I changed due to the conflict with the Surratt wedding. Hope these dates work better for everyone.

C.p.
Hey there.
I just sent Jim  a message.
The relations from Ireleand are coming late June/early July so the 3rd/4th would seem to work for them.
I am off to see them this weekend, so I shall get back to folks with an update.

Take care.

C.P.

Jason
Hey Family.  The Surratts likely won't be there unfortunately.  Megan Surratt is getting married at the end of July!

Wendy
We thought she said the first wknd. in Aug? That's why jim thought this wknd. would work?That stinks!!! Everyone will miss you guys.

Megan
Hey guys me n my fiance are gonna try n come n maybe my brother Matt hope to see u guys love u all

C.p.
And the big news is...
Look for the Connollys of Galway to be in Columbus on the 4th of July!

I am in Ireland at the moment and it is looking very likely that our Irish cousins will be joining us at the reunion.

Ann Connolly and Peggy Connolly are looking to come over along with the possibility of a few others...

Sean
Wonderful! I can't wait to see them.

Chris
Ditto - we'll have to plan out some activities for when everyone comes to town.

C.p.
I just received the Irish cousin's itinerary.
They are due into Columbus Friday.
There return flight is out on Sunday.

Cheers.

C.P.
